alert.note: Alert for Live Oak; McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 7:07PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central McMullen and west central Live Oak Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 706 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Simmons, or 11 miles southeast of Tilden, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Simmons. This includes the following highways... US Highway 281 between mile markers 624 and 626. US Highway 59 between mile markers 728 and 732. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
